TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nahdawlu', title = nahdawlu', year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nahdawlu'} }

S.FORM: nahdawlu' atu hungliten(kamu nu Hulam: 紅綠燈) muculil piazih tu nahdawlu'. tanunahdawlu' sa ku zazazazanan nu i tukayay.
nahdawlo' ato hongliten(kamo no Holam: 紅綠燈) mocolil piazih to nahdawlo'. tanonahdawlo' sa ko zazazazanan no i tokayay.
